description: Surrogate primary key for this asset–procedure schedule record.
Identifier of the parent maintenance schedule this record belongs to.
Identifier of the specific asset to which this scheduled procedure applies.
Identifier of an asset group targeted by the schedule instead of an individual asset; confirm with SME.
Code indicating the maintenance category (e.g., preventive, inspection, regulatory); confirm with SME.
Identifier of the maintenance procedure to be performed for this asset under the schedule.
Date the schedule becomes effective for this asset–procedure.
Date the schedule ceases to be effective or expires for this asset–procedure.
Number of remaining occurrences to generate before the schedule completes or is deactivated.
Most recent date this procedure was scheduled for the asset.
Most recent completion date for this scheduled procedure on the asset.
System-computed next due date based on frequency rules and last completion or scheduling.
System-computed next due meter reading (e.g., miles, hours) when the procedure becomes due; null if not meter-based.
Additional scheduling options or flags encoded for this record; format and usage vary by implementation, confirm with SME.
Timestamp when the record was last updated by any process or the system.
Timestamp of the last modification performed by a user (as opposed to automated processes); confirm with SME.
Flag to suppress generating work for this schedule while still updating lower-interval PMs or counters; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating the record originated from an external import or integration.
Indicator that remaining_number_to_schedule is enforced for this record; confirm with SME.
Flag to allow scheduling only during the asset’s defined in-season period.
Flag to allow scheduling during the asset’s out-of-season period.
Flag to automatically repeat this schedule annually.
Flag to automatically delete or deactivate the schedule after the final occurrence or end date; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by a user.
